text:
GetFPV | Digital Marketing Specialist | Sarasota, FL | ONSITE, Full-time

We're the largest US-based e-commerce site supplying drone parts and accessories. We're looking for a digital marketing specialist to grow our brand.

Relevant terms: facebook ads, growth hacking, google ppc, seo, sem, social media, digital marketing

Full job description and application here: https://getfpv.workable.com/j/FC704194E9
